text: Aey eman walo! Tum unn logon ki tarah na ho jana jinhon ney kufur kiya aur apney bhaiyon kay haq mein jabkay woh safar mein hon ya jihad mein hon kaha kay agar yeh humaray pass hotay to na martay aur na maaray jatay iss ki waja yeh thi kay iss khayal ko Allah Taalaa unn ki dili hasrat ka sabab bana dey Allah Taalaa jilata aur maarta hai aur Allah tumharay amal ko dekh raha hai
